text: Dia Evtimova was the defending champion, having won the previous event in 2011, but chose not to participate. Tereza Mrdeža won the title, defeating Paula Ormaechea in the final, 2–6, 6–4, 7–5. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw Zagreb Ladies Open - Singles
title: 2018 Zagreb Ladies Open – Singles
